name: ATL Lasertechnik US
description:
ATL Lasertechnik US introduces the ATLEX-FBG, high efficient excimer laser for Fiber Bragg Grating (FBG) writing applications where high spatial coherence and temporal beam stability are required. The ATLEX-500-FBG, available at  193 nm or 248nm, yields up to 15mJ, 6.5W and features high spatial coherence length > 300 µm.All ATLEX excimer lasers are totally air cooled and incorporate the most advanced technology available. Our redesigned totally ceramic-metal tube, with its proprietary solid state pulser and efficient soft corona preionization, provides continuous long term operation, even at repetition rates up to 1kHz. ATLEX lasers deliver the lowest operation costs on the market and service intervals to several billon shots. ATL Lasertechnik is #1 in compact excimer lasers and the perfect solution for a wide variety of applications such as FBG, micromachining, medicine and spectroscopy for high duty cycle industrial applications. www.ATL-Laser.com.
2794 Gateway RdCarlsbad,CAUnited States

name: Brighterwave, Inc.
description:
Brighterwave Inc. (Finland) designs and sells visible laser light sources to augmented reality eyewear and biomedical-imaging applications. Our novel laser technology is based on frequency conversion bringing several advantages to target applications: unparalleled image quality, ultra-compact and cost-efficient design and free-space / SM fiber coupled output (1…100 mW) at any specific wavelength. We design and develop our products in-house and operate through world-class manufacturing partners.
PO Box 266TampereFinland

name: AMTRON GmbH
description:
Amtron GmbH develops and markets high-quality laser-diode power supplies, laser-diode controllers, laser-diode turnkey systems and pyrometry solutions. Clients include laser manufacturers, system integrators and R&D specialists using Amtron systems in machining or medical technology around the globe. Apart from high-end products with integrated process control, simple applications are also provided by Amtron models, which never-the-less feature all of the necessary functions for deployment in industry. Most popular product families are CS400 series turnkey laser-diode controllers, CM100 series OEM laser-diode power supply modules and SE200 pyrometry solutions for fast process monitoring and control.Keywords: laser diode controller, laser controller, diode laser integration, laser system, power supply, high power, high current, turnkey, benchtop, OEM component, ultra compact, TEC, peltier, pyrometer, power meter, monitoring, closed loop control, process control, process monitoring, regulation, burn-in, lifetime testing, laser control software, single emitter, bar, cw, qcw, pulse, digital, RS232, CAN, LAN, web interface, PLC, safe operation, interlock, redundancy, fiber plug detection, fiber break detection, humidity monitoring
Neustrasse 26WürselenGermany

name: Integrated Optics
description:
Integrated Optics is a manufacturer of ultra-compact CW laser sources and a developer of miniaturized pulsed lasers. Proprietary manufacturing technology allows tight integration of optics and electronics into single-box products. Established in 2012 company developed a series of ultra-compact lasers called MatchBox and launched the product onto the market in 2013. Recently – in October 2015, Integrated Optics has developed an upgraded platform MatchBox2. The MatchBox2 series of lasers consists of direct diode and DPSS lasers covering over 25 different wavelengths. These continuous wave lasers are most compact on the market – it feature ultra-compact All-in-One design which means that the laser head includes optical components and driving electronics within a single enclosure. Also, MatchBox2 series lasers feature superior power stability, fiber coupling options, thermally stabilized optics, monolithic design, automatic power control and also are hermetically sealed. Diode lasers could be powered directly from USB port. Most of diode and DPSS lasers have narrow-spectrum versions, including a single longitudinal mode option. Single-mode and PM fiber coupled versions are also available as standard products.Compact MatchBox2 lasers are used in numerous life science applications, such as Raman spectroscopy, fluorescence imaging, food sorting as well as diagnostics.
Kalvariju Str 125B2nd Fl XI BldgVilnius,VilniausLithuania

name: Rikola Ltd.
description:
Rikola Ltd. is an expert and pioneer in miniature spectral measurement tools. Founded in 1993 as a spin-off from VTT technical research center, Rikola Ltd. has grown up as a strategic partner for customers in paper and pulp process control section, oil industry (rigs), food industry, among others. Flexible and cost effective high-end quality in small to medium volumes has been proven in long-term customer relationships.Rikola Ltd. offers small and lightweight hyperspectral camera for UAVs. This innovative product is a frame-based spectral system providing true snapshot images. The frame based approach enables an easy image stitching for the mosaics with high resolution images. The solution doesn’t need IMU for its operations, which makes the system low cost and low weight. The camera enables handheld use with computers too. Rikola offers also OEM multichannel- and LED-modules as well as miniature spectrometers
Kaitovayla 1 F2OuluFinland

name: Lumetrics, Inc.
description:
For more than a decade, Lumetrics® has been providing installations of its OptiGauge™ thickness measurement system to hundreds of companies throughout the world, including 6 of the top 11 medical device manufacturers, the top four ophthalmics companies, and the largest glass manufacturers in the world.  Lumetrics is known worldwide for its proven non-contact measurement system, OptiGauge™. With the recent addition of products acquired from Abbott Medical Optics, Lumetrics provides wavefront analysis of Intraocular and contact lenses, and laser beams in industry, government and independent research labs.  Our systems are deployed in quality and R&D labs, and production floors providing real-time measurements to improve yield, reduce costs, improve quality and meet compliancy requirements.To find out what Lumetrics, Inc. can do for you, visit www.Lumetrics.com .
Eagle's Landing Business Park1565 Jefferson Road #420Rochester,NYUnited States

name: Vortran Laser Technology, Inc.
description:
Vortran Laser Technology, Inc. specializes in high performance Stradus® laser diode modules at wavelengths from the UV to the near-IR (375nm to ~780nm, and other wavelengths are available upon request).  All of our modules are self-contained with beam shaping optics and drive electronics in a small, industry standard footprint.  The Stradus® can be supplied as an OEM head or a completely CDRH compliant system with power supply/control box.  The beam pointing stability, power stability, and long term reliability is unsurpassed by any other module manufacturer.  For example, our Stradus® 405-100 laser module life testing has over 55,000 hours of reliability data where every optical parameter is measured and reported.  Our graphical user interface software is provided to control your Vortran Stradus® laser diode module and allows you to adjust power, switch to digital modulation, and will output basic information about the module including wavelength, power, and hours used through a USB or RS-232 interface. Stradus® Laser diode modules are optimal for numerous applications in life sciences, medical, industrial, defense & security, scientific research, graphic arts & display, and many other markets.  These applications include but are not limited to flow cytometery, confocal imaging (such as CLSM, TIRF, FRET, STED, etc), brain tissue excitation, other in vitro applications, metrology, optical food sorting, particle sizing, and 3D scanning.  CE mark and RoHS compliant.
21 Goldenland Court, #200Sacramento,CAUnited States

name: "Nello Carrara" Institute of Applied Physics
description:
The “Nello Carrara” Institute of Applied Physics (IFAC) is part of the National Research Council (CNR), which is the main public organisation pursuing research and innovation in Italy.  IFAC buildings. TITLEIMGLIGHTBOX IFAC’s main aim is to carry out frontier research at an international level and, at the same time, to develop new technologies and methodologies that could be effectively transferred to the economic system. The approaches involved are theoretical, experimental and applied research, with a firm determination to developnew techniques and to build prototypes of instruments. The illustrative outline shows the main research lines around the inner core of physical methods of scientificinvestigations. These pertain to the general fields of optoelectronics, spectroscopy, andICT. The main lines of research are Lasers, Bio-photonics, Micro-optics, Sensors, Remote Sensing, Microwaves, and ICT. These physical methods are then employed to investigate novel applications in several branches of interdisciplinary sciences, such as photonic devices for telecommunications, space, balloon and airborne instrumentation for observations of the Earth, digital solutions for information access, bio-photonics for therapy and surgery, laser processing for industrial production, optical sensors for environmental control, laser techniques and diagnostic methods for archaeometry and the conservation of the cultural Heritage.
Via Madonna del Piano 10Sesto Fiorentino,FIItaly

description:

The PicoXea is the first “all-in-one” picosecond resolution fluorescence lifetime measurement analyzer designed with  optical fiber and Time-Correlated Single Photon Counting (TCSPC) technologies that delivers ultra-high Photon Detection Efficiency within the 450 nm to 1700 nm spectral range, in an exceptionally compact box and very-easy-to-use customer-centric Graphical User Interface. name: Tecnottica Consonni S.r.l.
description:
Tecnottica Consonni is an optical manufacturing company being on the market since 1957 and specialized in the manufacturing of optical components in glass and in plastic materials as well as of finished optical systems for imaging and illumination devices. Thanks to the built-in metrology department and to the wide choice of CNC and traditional machines for cutting, grinding, polishing and centering of optical surfaces, Tecnottica Consonni is the leader company of the italian optical market, prouds to serve its customers all over the world.The range of products offered to our customers is one of the most varied and complex of the optical and photonics market: it involves applications ranging from imaging and lighting to optoelectronics, optomechanics, photonics, lasers, biomedical sciences and renewable energies such as solar and photovoltaics. We produce spherical and aspherical lenses, prisms, optical filters, optical mirrors, light guides, reflectors and many others optical elements customizing all our customers' requests.Tecnottica offers also a wide range of complementary services, like the application of anti-reflective and high-reflective coatings, thermal and chemical tempering of glassy substrates, engineering and modelling of imaging and lighting optical systems, construction of mechanical elements for the housing of the optics as well as assembly, testing and final certification of single and finished optical systems.

name: Wavelength Electronics, Inc.
description:
For 20 years, Wavelength Electronics has been simplifying advanced laser diode and thermal control for demanding electro-optical OEMs and researchers. We deliver instrument level performance in small, cost-effective modules.Ultra-stable, high precision quantum cascade laser and laser diode drivers and temperature controllers are available for a wide range of applications such as biomedical, imaging, spectroscopy, remote sensing, military, aerospace, communications, material processing, environmental and manufacturing control.  Laser diode safety is paramount and protection is built into every module.Wavelength Electronics recently added the QCL Series Low Noise Quantum Cascade Laser Drivers. This OEM controller is available for CW control up to 2 A with low RMS noise (0.7 mA with the QCL1000) for field-deployed or benchtop applications.  The patented circuitry minimizes laser linewidth, spectral drift, and center wavelength jitter.  The QCL Series is the ideal way to increase your chemical sensor performance.Wavelength Electronics products are backed by a team of professionals.  Engineers offer unlimited, free, knowledgeable technical support.  Detailed datasheets and design tools simplify system integration.  Quality manufacturing controls ensure on-time delivery of robust, reliable product.  Evaluation quantities are available from stock.
51 Evergreen DrBozeman,MTUnited States

name: Kinetic River Corp.
description:
Kinetic River is a biophotonics design, consulting, and product development company with a mission to create tools for innovative life science research and biomedical diagnostics. Our services include: design and prototyping; training seminars; and technology, IP, and due-diligence assessments. We are experts in optics and microfluidics, and have successfully developed and brought products to market. We focus on cellular analysis, and our core know-how is flow cytometry technology development. Services: One of our key differentiators is our extensive expertise in system design. We bring to the table not only decades of experience and numerous successful product launches; but also proprietary system design tools that make the difference between "marginal" and "outstanding." Our interactive optical system design tool, LiveIdeas, is a "flight simulator" for complex photonics systems, with a dashboard giving real-time design feedback. Our partnership with BeamWise delivers the first-of-its-kind integrated optomechanical design automation tool.Products: The Danube II is a novel approach to flow cytometry for measuring fluorescence lifetime. Based on pulsed excitation and time-domain analysis, the Danube II can extract multi-exponential decay parameters from single cells at throughputs of thousands of cells per second. Applications enabled by our technology include quantitative FRET; cellular metabolism analysis; and cell signaling, such as protease function assays.
19925 Stevens Creek Blvd., Suite 100Cupertino,CAUnited States

name: Integrated Detector Electronics AS
description:
IDEAS - Integrated Detector Electronics AS - develops and markets integrated circuits for radiation detection and imaging applications. The company was founded in 1992 with strong background in applied physics, radiation detector instrumentation and electrical engineering. The headquarter is located near Oslo, Norway. The products are application specific integrated circuits (ASICs) for many types of radiation detectors, which are used in medical imaging, industrial scanning, nuclear science and astrophysics. The circuits can be delivered in any quantities to commercial and scientific customers worldwide. The ASICs feature low-noise and low-power amplifiers for the readout of, for example, CZT/CdTe/TlBr, silicon, PMTs/MCPs and APDs/SiPMs/MPPCs. Depending on the requirements, the circuits provide fully digital frame- or list-mode data (pulse heights, addresses, trigger time, counts, etc.). For space applications, the circuits are designed radiation hardened against latch-up and single-event upset. Recent ASIC designs support spectroscopic photon counting, dose monitoring, continuous waveform sampling, cryogenic operations, and infrared focal-plane arrays.
Martin Linges Vei 25FornebuNorway

name: Frankfurt Laser Co.
description:
Frankfurt Laser Company was founded 1994 by Dr. Vsevolod Mazo in Frankfurt. FLC is a private company engaged in development, production and distribution of a wide range of FP, DFB and DBR laser diodes, SM individually addressable and broad area laser diode arrays, VCSELs and Quantum Cascade lasers and incorporating them products - laser diode modules free space and fiber-coupled, diode-pumped SS frequency-doubled lasers and OEM modules. Its products cover 370nm to 12um wavelength and 5mW to 750W power range.FLC supplies superluminescent diodes in visible and IR from 680nm to 2300nm and mid-IR LEDs in 1.6µm – 4.5µm range.To complement the main line of products FLC supplies SMT laser diode drivers and collimator optic, line generator optic, laser diode headers and caps, laser diode die.Our company proudly serves laser community worldwide through its network of international sales representatives. We are able to support most demanding applications in:-	Military-	Space-	Harsh industrial environment-	MedicineOur experienced engineers will help you to use our products in your application or develop a product on demand. FLC offers custom development of laser diode products and consulting services on the laser diode market.If you look for hard to get laser diode product (exotic wavelength or custom packaging), FLC is the best address to call.

name: Special Optics, A Navitar Company
description:
Special Optics is dedicated to designing, prototyping and manufacturing innovative and high performance optical and electro-optical systems. Our expertise spans applications from military, semiconductor, biomedical, laser machining, and research institutes. We provide state-of-the-art optical solutions that are typically found in applications that demand the finest optical surfaces, highest accuracy and tightest tolerances. Areas of specialization include achromatic beam expanders, apochromatic scan lenses, biomedical optics, high resolution 4K projection lenses, and custom two-photon microscopy objective lenses. From optical and mechanical design, fabrication and polishing, precision assembly, coating, testing and verification, Special Optics is an innovative partner that will help turn your ideas into reality and ensure your optical solution meets your performance specifications.
Booth Number: 601

name: HOLOEYE Photonics AG
description:
HOLOEYE Photonics AG is providing products and services in the fields of diffractive optics (DOE), spatial light modulation (SLM) and LCOS microdisplay components. Diffractive OpticsHOLOEYE offers customized design, fabrication and replication of Diffractive Optical Elements. HOLOEYE has got capabilities for designing DOEs for projecting patterns on inclined surfaces and with arbitrary angles of diffraction. Additionally HOLOEYE provides a broad range of standard DOEs with various patterns like dot arrays, dot-circles, circles, multi-lines and cross patterns.Spatial Light ModulatorsHOLOEYE’s offers the greatest variety of Spatial Light Modulators (SLM) for phase and amplitude modulation. These SLM devices are based on translucent or reflective liquid crystal microdisplays. Additionally HOLOEYE offers the OptiXplorer, an education kit based on the translucent LC 2012 Spatial Light Modulator. This kit contains a variety of experiments for laboratory courses in optical physics. LCOS Microdisplay ComponentsHOLOEYE offers a variety of high resolution microdisplay types and products for a broad range of applications. Besides monochrome and color sequential LCOS microdisplays also drive ASICs and standard drive board solutions for evaluation are available. HOLOEYE also offers customized development of drive electronics, flex cables and display packages.
Booth Number: 2532

name: Critical Link LLC
description:
Critical Link offers customizable CMOS & CCD cameras designed for OEMs and systems integrators working on industrial, biomedical, scientific, defense, and surveillance applications. Our newest models incorporate sensors from Hamamatsu, CMOSIS, and Fairchild Imaging, with on-board image processing capabilities, multiple interface options, and a number of production-ready configurations. Our engineers work with clients to customize our cameras so that they meet their distinct set of requirements.
Booth Number: 451

display_name: Changchun New Industries Optoelectronics Tech. Co.,Ltd.
name: Changchun New Industries Optoelectronics Tech. Co.,Ltd.
description:
Changchun New Industries Optoelectronics Tech. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996. With strong R&D capability, including 80 engineers and 400 employees. CNI is the largest DPSS and diode laser manufacturers in China. Each year CNI produces 40,000 sets of laser modules, which are exported to more than 120 countries. With the features of high performance, easy operating, and long lifetime, CNI products are widely used in research, instruments, display, industrial process and so on.
Booth Number: 509

name: Pavilion Integration Corp.
description:
Pavilion Integration Corporation (PIC) designs and manufactures lasers and laser modules covering the UV, visible and IR wavelength range for instrumentation applications, predominantly for biotechnology and inspection. Biotechnology is the use of laser technologies in non-therapeutic biomedical applications ranging from research to clinical diagnostics for applications such as flow cytometry, cell sorting, microscopy, DNA sequencing and retinal scanning.  Optical inspection is using principles of scatterometry, ellipsometry, reflectometry, and optical profilometry using lasers to non-destructively test semiconductor and optoelectronic wafer surfaces for residual contamination, surface or subsurface defects, topographic variations and film thicknesses.  PIC’s laser technology is uniquely suited to address these applications.  PIC’s WhisperIT lasers utilize a patented technology that creates a beam with excellent mode quality, low noise under all conditions, and low speckle, but at a substantially reduced cost, footprint, and power consumption compared to ion or DPSS lasers.
Booth Number: 502

name: ISP Optics Corporation
description:
ISP Optics Corporation is a vertically integrated manufacturer offering a full range of the infrared products from high performance MWIR and LWIR Lens Assemblies to catalog and custom infrared optical elements. Our IR Lens Assembly product line includes continuous zoom, dual, triple FOV and fixed focal length lenses  for cooled and un-cooled cameras including designs targeted for light weight and compact models. ISP Optics manufactures in-house precision optical components including spherical, aspherical and diffractive coated optics. In addition to our built-to-print optical elements product line, we also offer custom opto -mechanical assemblies, coatings and diamond turning services along with  infrared catalog optics.  We manufacture optics from various infrared crystals  such as (Ge, Si, ZnS, ZnSe,  CaF2, GaAs, BaF2, Amtir, GASIR, IG6) and others. Our manufacturing processes utilize CNC Grinding, Diamond Turning, Continuous and Conventional Polishing, Optical Contacting, advanced coating and design technologies to deliver consistent top quality solutions that serve the growing industry demands with an unwavering commitment to our world-wide customers. FTIR materials are grown in-house including NaCl and KBr to manufacture build-to-print  optical elements  for the FTIR market and KBr lenses for wideband imaging applications. ISP Optics is ISO 9001-2008 certified and DDTC registered company, fully compliant with ITAR requirements.

name: Lightspeed Technologies Inc.
description:
Product lines include LED illuminators for applications including optogenetics, fluorescence imaging and high speed imaging, Optical Tweezers, Spectrometers, Optomechanics, Piezo Stages, well plate illuminators,  and Optical Metrology. U.S. Distributor for Photon Control, Elliot Scientific, Mechonics, and Laser Lab Göttingen.LED Illuminators - The HPLS Series illumination systems include precise linear analog control for very bright LED output for fluorescence illumination and optogenics to very low LED output for low light application requirements.  LED emitters are easily interchangeable and two and three wavelength configurations are available.Optical Tweezers - Lightspeed Technologies supplies the Elliot Scientific optical tweezer systems in the USA and Mexico.  Tweezer systems attach to existing microscopes with a light tight enclosure for safety or are available in open laboratory configurations.  Single trap and multiple trap configurations provide great flexibility and force measurement is available by high speed video algorithms or measured with quadrant detectors.Spectrometers - SPM fiber coupled spectrometers include economical  UV, Visible, and NIR configurations.Stages - Manual adjusted and long travel piezo stages provide accurate positioning of samples and are available in vacuum and cryo-configurations.Beam Profile and Wavefront Measurement instruments available accurately characterize Excimer and solid state lasers.

name: Artemis Optical Ltd.
description:
Artemis Optical Limited is a world renowned company with an enviable history of 60 years in the design and application of high precision, technically differentiated optical thin film coatings.Artemis’ client portfolio includes blue chip original equipment manufacturers in the Analytical Instrumentation, Defence and Aerospace, Medical Instrumentation, Research, Security and Space markets worldwide.Headed by a team of 4 Directors and employing 47 talented staff, Artemis is located at Langage Science Park, Plymouth, South West of England. name: Applied Optics, Inc.
description:
Applied Optics, Inc. (AOI) has been supplying customers with high-end optical components and assemblies for more than 35 years. From concept to final product, AOI delivers: Lenses (simple, complex, aspheric, cylindrical), Mirrors (aluminum sio, silver, gold, dielectric), Filters, Prisms, Wedges, Assemblies, Full design capabilities, Testing, and Custom machining. Equipment and facilities include: CNC lens generators, CNC lens polishing machines, Zygo interferometers, LOH Optical M-1 laser alignment cementing machine, laser attached centering machines and class 100 and 1000 clean rooms for final testing and assembly. Examples of industries served include: Aerospace, Semiconductor, Military, Medical, Display technologies, Solar, Industrial and Scientific applications.AOI is devoted to ensuring highest levels of customer satisfaction and service. Along the way earning the reputation of being creative and innovative and highly technical problem solvers.  Co-founders Joe Linke and Gerhard Koch, were European-trained and each having over 50 years experience in the industrial optics business. In 2001 the business operations were transitioned to Gerhard's son, Gery Koch and David Hill each with over 30 years industry experience. Together, with a dedicated staff of technicians, they've continued to deliver the exceptional quality and service customers have come to depend on.Phone: 925-932-5686 • Email: service@applied-optics.com • www.applied-optics.com
3349 Vincent RdPleasant Hill,CAUnited States

name: Stanford Photonics, Inc.
description:
Stanford Photonics, Inc. designs and manufactures digital intensified CCD (ICCD), intensified CMOS (ICMOS), and specialized CCD cameras for advanced scientific & surveillance imaging applications with megapixel resolution & speeds up to 8000 fps.  SPI offers a wide range of integrated systems with core specialization in ultra low-light imaging for defense/surveillance and life sciences including bioluminescence, Cerenkov, single molecule, and single photon imaging.  Our proprietary Piper Control™ software for real time data acquisition (all speeds) and camera control includes processing tools, ROI measurement, tracking, strip charting capability, and movie/image recording and playback with all onboard processing tools applied.  SPI also offers our ONYX™ Black Box (photon tight chamber) with new modifications allowing for hardware/support for internal macro (1X to 0.1X) and micro (5X 0.5 N.A.) scanned/sequential X-Y-Z imaging as well as environmental chambers for stabilization during imaging. Both COTs & custom OEM products are available - our capacity for customization is a cornerstone of SPI's longstanding business.
Booth Number: 503

name: Minus K Technology, Inc.
description:
Minus K Technology is a veteran owned California certified small business in the Los Angeles area that manufactures patented negative-stiffness vibration isolation systems. They will be displaying their newly released CM-1 isolator, a compact, high-capacity, low-frequency negative-stiffness isolator.  The isolators can be combined into multi-isolator systems to support heavy payloads while taking up very little room themselves. CM-1 isolator models can handle weight loads as low as 20 lbs and up to 800 lbs.Minus K’s isolators are low cost, passive, vacuum and clean room adaptable that require no air or electricity while offering the best isolation in the industry. Their products have been used for applications from small laboratory instruments to zero gravity simulation of large spacecraft structures.Minus K has completed six (6) custom 10,000 lb negative-stiffness vibration isolators for the ground testing of the new James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) at the Johnson Space Center (JSC). These isolators will suspend the new space telescope and the testing hardware within the Johnson Space Flight Center 120 feet tall Chamber A for system testing of the JWST.Their customers include: JPL, NASA, European Space Agency (ESA/ESTEC), German Space Agency (DLR), Northrup Grumman, Aerospace Corp, Raytheon and over 200 universities and government laboratories in 44 counties. Minus K has a line of standard bench top, workstation, table and floor platform vibration isolation products.
Booth Number: 217

name: ISP Optics Corporation
description:
ISP Optics Corporation is a vertically integrated manufacturer offering a full range of the infrared products from high performance MWIR and LWIR Lens Assemblies to catalog and custom infrared optical elements. Our IR Lens Assembly product line includes continuous zoom, dual, triple FOV and fixed focal length lenses  for cooled and un-cooled cameras including designs targeted for light weight and compact models. ISP Optics manufactures in-house precision optical components including spherical, aspherical and diffractive coated optics. In addition to our built-to-print optical elements product line, we also offer custom opto -mechanical assemblies, coatings and diamond turning services along with  infrared catalog optics.  We manufacture optics from various infrared crystals  such as (Ge, Si, ZnS, ZnSe,  CaF2, GaAs, BaF2, Amtir, GASIR, IG6) and others. Our manufacturing processes utilize CNC Grinding, Diamond Turning, Continuous and Conventional Polishing, Optical Contacting, advanced coating and design technologies to deliver consistent top quality solutions that serve the growing industry demands with an unwavering commitment to our world-wide customers. FTIR materials are grown in-house including NaCl and KBr to manufacture build-to-print  optical elements  for the FTIR market and KBr lenses for wideband imaging applications. ISP Optics is ISO 9001-2008 certified and DDTC registered company, fully compliant with ITAR requirements.

name: Spectra-Physics®, a Newport Company
description:
For over 50  years,  Spectra-Physics’ innovations have served as a catalyst for advancement, continually delivering upon your evolving needs in the area of biological imaging, fine material processing, medical applications, and advanced scientific research.Today, Spectra-Physics has more UV and ultrafast lasers installed and actively used than any other laser manufacture in the world.  To support the largest installed base in the industry, we rely on the most experienced and skilled worldwide field service organization.  As a Spectra-Physics laser user, it means you can always rely on direct, local support, a key advantage to fast track your demanding precision machining application.
Booth Number: 1400

name: Electro-Optics Technology, Inc.
description:
EOT is a leading provider of Faraday rotators, optical isolators, and fiber collimators for high power fiber lasers, solid-state lasers, and laser diodes for wavelengths from 390-4500nm.  Both free space and fiber pig-tailed versions as well as polarization insensitive and polarization maintaining isolators are available.  EOT also offers photodetectors for time domain and frequency response measurements.  Models are available from 190-2100nm with rise times as low as 35ps and frequency responses as high as >12.5GHz.  Detectors with built-in amplifiers are also available.
Booth Number: 2500

name: Uniforce Sales & Engineering
description:
Uniforce Sales and Engineering specializes in image acquisition and processing, machine vision, video recording, professional broadcasting cameras, custom modifications, system integration, custom software development, instrumentation, and vision hardware equipment.  For over 28 years, Uniforce has provided cost effective, highly reliable imaging systems and solutions to semiconductor, military, manufacturing automation, medical, aerospace, and broadcasting industries amongst others.  We offer cutting edge image acquisition and image processing solutions to OEMs, distributers, VARs, contract manufacturers and End Users. Our experts have the technical knowledge and experience to assist you.The continued success of Uniforce Sales and Engineering is based on long and well-established relationships that we have earned from customers, suppliers, business associates, employees, and we have the ability to engage new customers to forge new relationships. We have a customer first philosophy, whether it is a small business or a global enterprise, the same high level of commitment and service applies. We look forward to serving you.Uniforce Sales and Engineering - Your single source for Imaging Solutions.Uniforce is a Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business SDVOSB.
42501 Albrae St Ste 210Fremont,CAUnited States

name: INSION GmbH
description:
INSION is the leading manufacturer of monolithic micro spectrometers and spectral sensors for OEM applications.INSION GmbH, seated in Heilbronn/Germany, focuses on the development and production of miniaturized spectral sensors and spectrometers for OEM-integration in diagnostic instruments and analytical applications.INSION's core technology is a spectrometer platform which integrates all functional optical elements in a single micro injection-molded chip. The spectrometers are extraordinary robust against harsh environments like mechanical shock, vibrations, temperature, humidity and dust. Accelerations up to 300 g are possible without damaging the spectrometers.The molding process enables a very cost-effective volume production. Minimal manufacturing tolerances grant a high reproducibility and an excellent inter-instrument conformity. This allows customers to transfer calibration data to the entire series of devices in production and to reduce manufacturing costs significantly.INSION offers solutions for the complete sample centered optical path including light source, free-space or fiber sampling optics. We deliver design and production services starting with basic design work, feasibility studies and consulting for the final product of our customer‘s throughput production processes and life cycle management.As an application development service INSION offers support for spectral analysis and chemometrics.
Weipertstr. 8 - 10HeilbronnGermany

name: INGENERIC GmbH
description:
INGENERIC develops and manufactures micro-optics, beam shaping modules and OEM laser systems for applications in medical and production engineering, printing and sensor industry as well as in the electronics field. The range of optical elements comprises aspherical collimation optics, beam transformation optics and customized aspheres. Optical modules are offered for efficient fiber coupling of multi-mode- and single-mode-diode lasers as well as beam shaping modules for distinct intensity distributions (line, square, circle, rectangle). OEM laser systems comprise fiber coupled single-mode and multi-mode lasers, line generators and top-hat convertors. Standard and customized designs are offered in the following product ranges. Micro-Optics- Fast-axis collimation optics (FAC)- Slow-axis-collimation optics (SAC)- Beam transformation optics (BTS)- Micro-lens arrays- Micro-aspheresMacro-Optics- Acylinders - AspheresSystems- OEM high-power diode laser systems- OEM top-hat convertors (line, square, rectangle, dot, ring)INGENERIC GmbH was established in 2001. name: Elforlight Ltd.
description:
Elforlight is a worldwide supplier of advanced Diode Pumped Solid State (DPSS) lasers.  Based in the UK,  our products include CW and q-switched, IR, visible and UV.  We work closely with both researchers and OEMs to supply single quantity and higher volume production.    Our lasers are designed for high reliability and stable performance.  Customer service provides responsive actions and on-time delivery.  Applications include photo-acoustic microscopy, MALDI imaging, Raman spectroscopy, FLIM, LIDAR, holography, flow visualization, rapid prototyping, and printing plate imaging.  Elforlight lasers satisfy performance requirements for 24/7 operation.Recent introductions- 3 um, 100 micJ @ 1kHz, 5kHz max, Model OPO/FLP- 1197 nm, 500 micJ @ 1kHz, 5kHz max, Model RS- 560-610 nm, 5 micJ @ 5kHz, 10kHz max, Model DL/SPOT- 355 nm, 100 micJ @ 1kHz, 10kHz max, Model FQSY- 266 nm, 2 micJ @ 10kHz, 25kHz max, Model SPOTEstablished products- 1064 & 1342 nm up to 1W CW SLM, Model I4 for inspection and measurement precision- 532 & 1064 nm, 2ns, 50kHz max, Model SPOT for short pulse duration- 532 & 1064 nm, 10-15ns, 10kHz max, Model FQ for more power- 473 & 532 SLM, Models G4 & B4 for Raman Spectroscopy- 532 nm up to 6W, Model HPG for pumping Ti-sapphire systemsChat with us about the latest status,  including efforts to generate even higher energies at 266, nm, 1064 nm and 3 um. We have extensive experience coating temperature sensitive substrates such as fiberoptic components, molded polymer optics, high expansion glasses, metals, BaF2, CaF2, LBO, KTP, BBO, GaAs & InP. name: Ealing Catalog Inc.

name: Diode Laser Concepts, Inc.
description:
Diode Laser Concepts - Custom. Integrated. Solutions. We leverage your engineering capabilities with our proven laser and optical design expertise. We solve manufacturing challenges by providing turnkey, high-quality optoelectronic and mechanical solutions. We deliver your production capacity needs from prototypes to full-scale OEM volume, with DLC-owned domestic and offshore manufacturing options. Our relationship-based business has been developing successful long-term partnerships since 1991.DLC specializes in custom designed laser solutions including precision optical assemblies, custom electronics packaging, fiber pigtails, TEC cooling, and custom Diffractive Optical Elements. We can meet your wavelength requirements from 375nm up to 1650nm and output powers from less than 1mW to 600mW. Beam options including elliptical spots, round beams, Gaussian lines, uniform lines, and crosshairs with all of these beams available in collimated or custom-focused designs. Located in Medford, Oregon, DLC occupies a 15,000 square foot custom-designed facility. DLC is an ISO 9001:2008 registered manufacturing company with products compliant with FDA/CDRH, CE, and IEC 60825-1 requirements. DLC provides world-class laser solutions for over 200 customers in over 20 countries with products that are used across a broad spectrum of OEM applications including medical, machine vision, 3D scanning, measurement, manufacturing, automotive, mining, lumber, range-finding, defense, and many others.
Booth Number: 4445

name: Innovations In Optics, Inc.
description:
Innovations in Optics, Inc. offers high power LED light sources for science and industry that provide maximum photon delivery, illumination uniformity, and stable optical power. Products offer system-level advantages over lasers and arc lamps in OEM equipment for many applications. LumiBright™ light engines and illumination systems feature patented and patent-pending optics which collect, direct and maximize output efficiency and uniformity, enabling some of today’s most revolutionary solutions in cutting-edge technical applications for LED light sources.Available peak LED wavelengths range from 365 nm through the near-infrared as well as broadband white with single or multicolor options, and configured as dense chip-on-board LED arrays with unmatched thermal management. LumiBright light engines offer short warm-up time, high energy efficiency, low maintenance and long life. Some models can be fiber-coupled. Light engine system accessories include thermal management devices, wire harnesses and driver/controllers.The products serve OEMs in biotechnology, medical and industrial equipment. Many are used as excitation sources in fluorescent imaging for life science applications. UV LED products support maskless lithography and photocuring. Extreme brightness line sources enable high speed line scanning in machine vision. Fiber-coupled light engines provide superior light delivery for industrial borescopes, medical endoscopes, microscopes, and UV spot curing.
Booth Number: 2603

name: LASER-COMPACT / LASER-EXPORT
description:
Founded in 1992, Laser-compact specializes in R&D and manufacture of diode-pumped solid-state lasers. The Laser-compact group of the companies (including Laser-export Co.) designs and manufactures IR, green and UV Q-switched and CW lasers for use in analytical, scientific and industrial applications.  Products include Q-switched and CW lasers, small laser modules and compact laser systems. Typical applications include materials testing and microprocessing, various types of spectroscopy (including Raman and LIBS), Laser-Induced Breakdown-Detection (LIBD), photoacoustics, LIDAR applications, mass-spectrometry and laser microdissection. The group sells its products through distributors and OEMs all over the world.  The biggest Russian exporter of DPSS lasers. Over 48,000 of DPSS lasers have been produced and delivered to world-leading industrial companies and scientific organizations. QC system of Laser-export company  is certified to comply with ISO 9001:2008. 
Booth Number: 512

name: StellarNet, Inc.
description:
Since 1991, StellarNet, Inc. has been a global provider of low cost miniature spectrometers and spectroscopy software for product analysis, research, education, and OEM. StellarNet instrumentation is rugged for any environment- lab, process, or field. We offer complete systems and accessories including integrating spheres, light sources, optical fibers, and probes. Applications include LED/Laser characterization, solar spectral analysis, thin-film metrology, colorimetry, chemistry, and LIBS. 
Booth Number: 313

name: Nanomotion Inc.
description:
Nanomotion is the leader in piezo based motors and modules for shutter & aperture control, thermal weapon sites, auto focus and zoom for target acquisition, and optical image stabilization. Our motors / modules are supported by our ASIC or MCU for superior closed loop performance. Products are flight qualified, meet all required MIL Specs, and have passed thermal and vibration testing to meet the most demanding applications.Nanomotion's products operate silently and optimize SWaP, with zero power consumption at rest. Unique modules are configured for rotary shutters, that have all electronics inside the shutter body and a NanoGimbal - gyro stabilizied, 26mm diameter x 30mm high, pand and tilt platform for micro UAVs.
Booth Number: 830

name: First Light Imaging SAS
description:
First Light Imaging designs and builds scientific cameras that combine extreme sensitivity and high speed for both visible and infrared spectra (SWIR).  Coming from major European academic research institutes, already multiple award-winning, First Light Imaging works with famous research institutes and manufacturers worldwide, in Astronomy as well as in Biology and Industry areas. First Light Imaging's range of cameras offers three revolutionary products:- OCAM²K, our 2000 fps full frame camera with sub-electron read out noise, - OCAM²S, same performances with an embedded shutter and minimal pulse width lower than 300 nanoseconds, mostly for laser applications, - C-RED, 3500 fps full frame, with readout noise lower than 1 electron, e-APD technology, and cooled MCT. 
Booth Number: 408

name: Finger Lakes Instrumentation
description:
FLI designs and manufactures cooled CCD cameras, filter wheels, high speed filter wheels and precision focusers. ProLine and MicroLine cameras cool up to 75C below ambient; 1-, 2-, and 4-channel 16 bit readout with up to 24MHz total digitization; front-illuminated, back-illuminated, and interline transfer CCDs, with resolution to 50 megapixels. Our Cobalt CCD camera features very large sensors and deep cooling. High speed filter wheels change to adjacent filter in as little as 23 milliseconds.  Atlas focuser travels 8mm in 85nm steps.  The CenterLine filter wheel features dual, overlapping 5- or 10- position carousels with centered aperture.  Our proprietary Zero Tilt Adapter (ZTA) prevents tilted components, marred adapters, and wobbly interfaces.  We design and manufacture imaging systems for OEM applications.
Booth Number: 600

name: RGB Lasersysteme GmbH
description:
The company RGB Lasersysteme was started in 2001 and has its base in Kelheim,Germany. It took RGB Lasersysteme few years to establish itself internationally as a company for outstanding photonic technologies.RGB Lasersysteme designs and manufactures innovative laser and spectroscopy solutions for industry, science and research. Its focus is on miniaturized high-end and powerful laser systems in combinatin with optical detection. RGB Lasersysteme offers a wide variety of laser systems for almost any application.Our dedicated engineering teams work closely with OEM partners to deliver customized solutions within extraordinary short periods. Our unique expertise in miniaturized laser and spectroscopy systems enables us to create highly integrated photonic devices for light creation and detection.
Booth Number: 4629

name: Sydor Optics, Inc.
description:
Sydor Optics is a custom manufacturer of precision flat-surfaced, parallel and wedged glass optical components specializing in double-sided and single-sided grinding & polishing, CNC machining and laser machining. Custom optical components manufactured with a variety of optical glass substrates include wafers, windows, filters, beamsplitters, wedges, lightpipes, mirrors, optical flats and witness samples. Finished products go through a meticulous visual inspection process and utilize a wide range of state-of-the-art metrology equipment. Additional services include optical coatings, ultrasonic cleaning in a class 10,000 cleanroom, and specialized packaging options. ITAR Registered, ISO 9001:2008 Certified.
